title: Monthly Mindfulness Meditation Practice|Lutheran Medical Center
cleaned_text: Monthly Mindfulness Meditation Practice Offered At: [Lutheran Spine Center at Denver West](/locations/lutheran-spine-center-at-denver-west/) Lakewood, CO Offered at the Lutheran Spine Center at Denver West This group meditation practice is for anyone who has previously completed a full MBSR class, or who has a well- established meditation practice. Please join us to deepen your practice, reconnect with old skills, and engage with a community of students of mindfulness.
